name: BANK OF AMERICA CORPORATION, et al., petitioners, v. CITY OF MIAMI, FLORIDA.
name_abbreviation: Bank of Am. Corp. v. City of Miami

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
BANK OF AMERICA CORPORATION, et al., petitioners,
v.
CITY OF MIAMI, FLORIDA.
attorneys: Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit granted. The case is consolidated and a total of one hour is allotted for oral argument.
casebody.head_matter:
BANK OF AMERICA CORPORATION, et al., petitioners,
v.
CITY OF MIAMI, FLORIDA.
No. 15-1111.
Supreme Court of the United States
June 28, 2016.
Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit granted. The case is consolidated and a total of one hour is allotted for oral argument.
